Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 nee Isravel Puththiraridaththil Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Oruvan Karththarudaiya Kattalaigalil Yaadhondrai Ariyaamaiyinaal Meeri, Seyyaththagaadhadhai Seydhu Paavaththukku Utpattaal Ariyavendiyadhaavadhu:

3 abishegam Petra Aasaariyan, Janangal Kutraththirku Utpadaththakkadhaagap Paavancheydhaal, Thaan Seydha Paavaththinimiththam Pazhudhatra Oru Ilankaalaiyaip Paavanivaarana Paliyaagak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvarakkadavan.
4 avan Andhak Kaalaiyai Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvandhu, Adhin Thalaimel Than Kaiyai Vaiththu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Adhaik Kollakkadavan.
5 appozhudhu Abishegam Petra Aasaariyan Andhak Kaalaiyin Raththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Adhai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Konduvandhu,
6 than Viralai Raththaththil Thoiththu, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Thiraikku Edhire Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Ezhudharam Thelikkakkadavan.

7 pinbu, Aasaariyan Andha Raththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Irukkum Sugandha Thoobapeedaththuk Kombugalinmel Poosi, Kaalaiyinudaiya Matra Raththam Muzhuvadhaiyum Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalukku Munbaaga Irukkira Thaganapalipeedaththin Adiyile Ootrivittu,
8 paavanivaaranapaliyaana Kaalaiyin Ellaak Kozhuppumaagiya Kudalgalai Moodiya Kozhuppaiyum, Avaigalmel Irukkira Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum,
9 irandu Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Avaigalmel Siru Kudalgalinidaththil Irukkira Kozhuppaiyum, Kundikkaaigalodekoodak Kalleeralinmel Irukkira Javvaiyum,
10 samaadhaanapaliyin Kaalaiyilirundhu Edukkiradhupola Adhilirundhu Eduththu, Avaigalaith Thaganapalipeedaththinmel Thaganikkakkadavan.
11 kaalaiyin Tholaiyum, Adhin Maamsam Muzhuvadhaiyum, Adhin Thalaiyaiyum, Thodaigalaiyum, Adhin Kudalgalaiyum, Adhin Saaniyaiyum,

12 kaalai Muzhuvadhaiyum Paalayaththukkup Purambe Saambal Kottugira Suththamaana Idaththile Kondupoi, Kattaigalinmel Pottu, Akkiniyaale Sutterikkakkadavan; Saambal Kottiyirukkira Idaththile Adhai Sutterikkakkadavan.

13 isravel Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Ariyaamaiyinaal Paavancheydhu, Kaariyam Thangal Kangalukku Maraivaayirukkiradhinaal, Karththarudaiya Kattalaigalil Yaadhondrai Meeri, Seyyaththagaadhadhai Seydhu, Paavaththukkutpattuk Kutravaaligalaanaal,
14 avargal Seydha Paavam Theriyavarumpodhu, Sabaiyaar Andhap Paavaththinimiththam Oru Ilankaalaiyai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukku Munbaagap Paliyidak Konduvaravendum.
15 sabaiyin Mooppar Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Thangal Kaigalai Adhin Thalaimel Vaikkakkadavargal; Pinbu Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Andhak Kaalaiyaik Kollavendum.
16 appozhudhu Abishegam Petra Aasaariyan Adhin Raththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Konduvandhu,
17 than Viralai Raththaththil Thoiththu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Thiraikku Edhire Ezhudharam Theliththu,

18 aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Irukkum Palipeedaththin Kombugalinmel Andha Raththaththil Konjam Poosi, Matra Raththamellaam Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Irukkira Thaganapalipeedaththin Adiyile Ootrivittu,
19 adhin Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum Adhilirundhu Eduththu, Palipeedaththinmel Thaganiththu,
20 paavanivaaranapaliyin Kaalaiyai Seydhapragaaram Indhakkaalaiyaiyum Seydhu, Ivvannamaai Aasaariyan Avargalukkup Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avargalukku Mannikkappadum.
21 pinbu Kaalaiyaip Paalayaththukkup Purambe Kondupoi, Mundhina Kaalaiyai Sutteriththadhupola Sutterikkakkadavan; Idhu Sabaikkaaga Seyyappadum Paavanivaaranapali.
22 oru Prabu Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Kattalaigalil Yaadhondrai Meeri Ariyaamaiyinaal Seyyaththagaadhadhai Seydhu, Paavaththukkutpattuk Kutravaaliyaanaal,
23 thaan Seydhadhu Paavam Endru Thanakkuth Theriyavarumpodhu, Avan Vellaadugalil Pazhudhatra Oru Ilankadaavaip Paliyaagak Konduvandhu,
24 andhak Kadaavin Thalaimel Than Kaiyai Vaiththu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Sarvaanga Thaganapali Kollappadum Idaththil Adhaik Kollakkadavan; Idhu Paavanivaaranapali.
25 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Adhin Raththaththil Konjam Than Viralaal Eduththu, Thaganapalipeedaththuk Kombugalinmel Poosi, Matra Raththaththaith Thaganapalipeedaththin Adiyile Ootrivittu,

26 adhin Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum, Samaadhaanapaliyin Kozhuppaip Pola, Palipeedaththil Thaganiththu, Ivvannamaai Aasaariyan Avan Seydha Paavaththaik Kuriththu Avanukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum.
27 saadhaarana Janangalil Oruvan Ariyaamaiyinaal Karththarin Kattalaigalil Yaadhondrai Meeri, Seyyaththagaadhadhai Seydhu, Paavaththukkutpattuk Kutravaaliyaanaal,
28 thaan Seydhadhu Paavam Endru Thanakkuth Theriyavarumpodhu, Avan Thaan Seydha Paavaththinimiththam Vellaadugalil Pazhudhatra Oru Penkuttiyaip Paliyaagak Konduvandhu,
29 paavanivaaranapaliyin Thalaimel Than Kaiyai Vaiththu, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyidum Idaththil Andhap Paavanivaaranapaliyaik Kollakkadavan.
30 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Adhin Raththaththil Konjam Than Viralaal Eduththu, Thaganapalipeedaththuk Kombugalinmel Poosi, Matra Raththamellaam Palipeedaththin Adiyile Ootrivittu,

31 samaadhaanapaliyilirundhu Kozhuppai Eduppadhupola, Adhin Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum Eduththu, Aasaariyan Palipeedaththinmel Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaagath Thaganiththu, Ivvannamaai Avanukkup Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum.
32 avan Paavanivaarana Paliyaaga Oru Aattukkuttiyaik Konduvaruvaanaagil, Pazhudhatra Penkuttiyaik Konduvandhu,
33 andhap Paavanivaaranapaliyin Thalaimel Than Kaiyai Vaiththu, Sarvaanga Thaganapali Kollappadum Idaththil Adhaip Paavanivaarana Paliyaagak Kollakkadavan.

34 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Andhap Paavanivaaranapaliyin Raththaththil Konjam Than Viralaal Eduththu, Thagana Palipeedaththuk Kombugalinmel Poosi, Matra Raththamellaam Palipeedaththin Adiyile Ootrivittu,

35 samaadhaana Paliyaana Aattukkuttiyin Kozhuppai Edukkiradhupola, Adhin Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum Eduththu, Karththarukku Idappadum Thaganapaligalaip Pola, Palipeedaththinmel Aasaariyan Thaganikkavendum; Ivvannamaai Avan Seydha Paavaththukku Aasaariyan Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum.
